column4: sandel: you should still be able to specify the LBA modes tho I think for sata?
memorylenin - sorry but no use to you I dont think.. not done much in the way of wireless with ubuntu yet myself :(
notsogutsy  - add the applet System monitor to your panel
:: as I see, system monitor doesn't show *what processes* are making it higher, just that it is higher
:: perhaps I'm missing something, then, as I have a total of 3 processes above 1% CPU usage [one being the system monitor], and my load average is 8.84
